item.um.demonomicon.lore: A guide to all of Undermagic.
item.um.demonomicon.example_page.title: Example Entry Page
item.um.demonomicon.example_page.history: This is where the history of the item would appear.
item.um.demonomicon.example_page.contrib: This is where the contributors to this feature would appear.
item.um.demonomicon.example_page.more_in: This is where additional information would appear.
item.um.demonomicon.example_page.recipe:
This is where the recipe would appear.

Or, alternatively, where the item could be found if it doesn't have a recipe.
item.um.demonomicon.example_page.give_co: This is where you would click to get an item.
item.um.demonomicon.example_page.descrip:
This is an example.

If you hover over the icons, you can read about them. 

After this page, there is a feature index.
item.um.demonomicon.page.feature_hover_e: Click here to open feature page
item.um.demonomicon.page.developers_hove: Click here to open developers page

item.um.demonomicon.index_page.title: Index Page (%s/%s)
item.um.demonomicon.cover_page.content: A comprehensive guide to all the content in Undermagic.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.zealot_tome.co:
Hashs: Created
Ragtime Gal: Textured Zealot's Tome
item.um.demonomicon.entry.zealot_tome.mo: There is also a hidden no-hit mode, which makes players die in a single hit.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.zealot_tome.hi:
%10$s: Added Lunatic.
%20$s: Added Infernal.
%34$s: Added no-hit mode.
%35$s: Added Zealot's Tome.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.zealot_tome.re:
Can be changed using the Zealot's Tome; obtain from the "give item" 
button on this page.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.zealot_tome.de: Undermagic contains two difficulty levels above vanilla, Lunatic and Infernal, which exclusively buff all six boss battles with new attacks and higher damage. These levels are made to challenge you and test your skill.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.zealot_tome_co:
Hashs: Created
Ragtime Gal: Textured Zealot's Tome
There is also a hidden no-hit mode, which makes players die in a single hit.

%10$s: Added Lunatic.
%20$s: Added Infernal.
%34$s: Added no-hit mode.
%35$s: Added Zealot's Tome.

Can be changed using the Zealot's Tome; obtain from the "give item"
 button on this page.

Lunatic difficulty is good for experienced vanilla players just starting with Undermagic; Infernal is better for experienced Undermagic players. Difficulties can be changed by opped players using the Zealot's Tome. %s
item.um.demonomicon.entry.undercrafter.c:
Hashs: Created
ImCoolYeah105: Reworked
Ragtime Gal: Textured
item.um.demonomicon.entry.undercrafter.r:
Place a crafting table in an item frame above a netherrack-lit fire.





쀁
item.um.demonomicon.entry.undercrafter.d:
The Undercrafter is a special crafting table used to create almost everything in Undermagic.

If a recipe in this book uses a crafting grid, use the Undercrafter to craft it.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.demons.title: Demons
item.um.demonomicon.entry.demons.more_in:
Demons have a dash attack that can go through thin walls. They used 
to be able to fly as well. Yeesh.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.demons.history:
%1$s: Added.
%5$s: Increased rare drop rates.
%14$s: Greater Demons nerfed.
%15$s: Made Lesser Demons drop sword shards
and made more demons spawn in fortresses.
%26$s: Nerfed.
%34$s: Retextured.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.demons.recipe: Demon Towers can be found throughout the Nether.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.demons.descrip: Demons are an ancient race of humanoid creatures not native to this plane. They thirst for blood and power, and work towards these by invading the Nether through their towers, which can be found throughout and spawn demons constantly.
Hashs: Created
ImCoolYeah105: Reworked
Ragtime Gal: Textured
Boss drops yield far more blood than other drops. For example, Nether Stars yield 100 blood each.

%6$s: Added.
%17$s: Added new burnable items.
%35$s: Changed obtaining method.

Place a cauldron in an item frame above a netherrack-lit fire.





쀂
The Blood Chalice is a cauldron infused with dark magic, allowing it to convert mob drops tossed in into blood, typically at a rate of 1 blood per item. That blood can then be used for %s.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.blood_infusion: There used to be seperate blocks to hold the items for Blood Infusion, called Pedestals.

Set up the Blood Altar like such.





쀅
Using the blood in a Chalice, you can perform rituals. Construct a Blood Altar as shown in the recipe section above. The corner blocks (in this case Radiant Monoliths) serve as Boosters. %s
Beacons used to be used as Tier III Boosters. Needless to say, that was painful to accomplish.

Tier I Boosters: Redstone Blocks
Tier II Boosters: Diamond Blocks
Tier III Boosters: Radiant Monoliths
Tier IV Boosters: Blood Monoliths
All recipes require you to have a certain tier of Boosters or higher. The list of Boosters is in the recipe section above. %s

Picking up any items during the process will result 
in the chalice eating all the remaining ones. Yikes.
Toss the items on the Boosters while you have the required amount of blood in the chalice and wait a few seconds to perform Blood Infusion.
Nether Shards are typically used to upgrade class-specific gear.
Fragmented pieces of the core of power animating the Wither, Nether Shards are used in many things.
Demon parts can also be found in various nether-related chests.
Demonic Steel, a tough alloy laced with dark energy, can be made from iron ingots and the various items dropped by %s
item.um.demonomicon.entry.demonic_steel_: Demonic Steel ingots and plates can be found in some bastion chests.
%s must be formed into plates in order to be forged into armor and weaponry, unlike other materials.

This longsword cannot be enchanted, but has higher attack power than 
an unenchanted netherite sword or Bloody Edge.
%s can be used to make a special sword. This sword cannot sweep and is slower, but can be sheathed and wielded to perform a Quick Draw attack.
This armor used to provide up to 40% flat damage reduction instead of extra toughness.
%s can be used to make a suit of armor. It produces a field of dark energy which provides up to 5 toughness per piece but decays as you get hit.
The explosions do not work inside the Shadesull Dungeon. They have a 100% block drop rate and the power of TNT.
%s can be used to make a powerful bow. The bow shoots higher velocity shots. If you have gunpowder, it consumes it to fire explosive shots.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.bow_of_niflhei: The Bow of Niflheim does not need to be charged, and its bolts pierce blocks and inflict slowness.
The Bow of Niflheim is an ancient weapon made by the Ice Demons that fires icy bolts. The bolts deal massive damage to demons.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.demon_portal_s: The Demon Portals made by the Stabilizer are the same as the ones found at the top of Demon Towers.
Throw this on top of obsidian to place a Demon Portal, which spews out demons at a fairly fast rate.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.demon_flame_sc: The Dragon Staff is identical to this weapon in attacking style, minus the fire-setting element.
A magic weapon, this scepter spews demon flames inflicting minor damage and setting wide swaths of ground aflame.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.demon_army.mor:
The Demon Army spawns a total of 61 demons.
Each of the three generals drops an offhand item and a weapon
for a specific class.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.demon_army.rec: Fought each time you slay the dragon and return to the Overworld.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.demon_army.des: After slaying the Ender Dragon and returning to the Overworld, you will find youself under attack by the Demon Army, including three of the %s's finest generals.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.pit_lord.title: Pit Lord
item.um.demonomicon.entry.pit_lord.more_:
Don't get too far away from him or too close. Do your best to avoid getting meleed.
You will want to have fully enchanted netherite armor,
or a similarly built armor set added by Undermagic.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.pit_lord.recip:
Can be fought with the Infernal Summons (by throwing into a demon portal), 
or at the end of the Demon Army.
Recipe for the Summons shown below.





쀘
item.um.demonomicon.entry.pit_lord.descr: After defeating %s, the Demon King himself may seek you out. The Pit Lord is a challenging boss who always appears at the end of the Demon Army.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.pit_lord_chest:
This chestplate used to be viable against the final boss before it was reworked.
It counts as three pieces of Demonic Steel armor for toughness.
Made from the heart of the Pit Lord, this chestplate provides supreme protection, granting incredible toughness, immunity to natural fire, and 25% fire damage reduction.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.sanguis_inspec: One mob drop is usually equal to one unit of blood.

Blood Cost: 10
Booster Tier: I





쀡
Right click with this mystical tome to accurately read off the blood amount in a nearby chalice.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.bloody_edge.mo: The tier III version used to heal you instantly on a hit.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.bloody_edge.hi:
%5$s: Added.
%34$s: Retextured.
%39$s: Nerfed and added tier IV version.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.bloody_edge.re:
Blood Cost: 10
Booster Tier: I



쀢





Blood Cost: 50
Booster Tier: II



쀣





Blood Cost: 250
Booster Tier: III



쀤




Blood Cost: 500
Booster Tier: IV



섩
item.um.demonomicon.entry.bloody_edge.de: This sword comes in four tiers, each with better attack damage and speed. The tier III and IV versions also grants regeneration on dealing damage.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.blood_rain_sta: The clouds persist for quite some time and drip blood straight down.

%23$s: Added.
%34$s: Retextured.
%39$s: Buffed and added tier IV version.

Blood Cost: 10
Booster Tier: I



쀥





Blood Cost: 50
Booster Tier: II



쀦





Blood Cost: 250
Booster Tier: III



쀧




Blood Cost: 500
Booster Tier: IV



섰
This magic staff targets enemies and drips harmful blood from above. It comes in four tiers, each with better damage.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.bloodstone.mor: The Bloodstone Elemental can drop a fireball on you from above.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.bloodstone.rec:
Obtained from the Bloodstone Elemental, a miniboss
summoned with the following ritual:

Blood Cost: 100
Booster Tier: II





쀨
item.um.demonomicon.entry.bloodstone.des: Blood infused stones obtained by slaying the Bloodstone Elemental, a miniboss summoned using Blood Infusion, Bloodstone can be used in many sanguine creations.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.animal_creatio:
Pigs cannot be created because they don't have secondary drops. Shame.
Also, rabbit hide is the secondary drop for rabbits, not feet.

For common animals with two drops, the beef indicates a meat
and the leather indicates a secondary drop like leather
or feathers.

Blood Cost: 5
Booster Tier: I





쀱






For horse-like animals, use a golden carrot
instead of a golden apple for donkeys.

Blood Cost: 25
Booster Tier: II





쀲
Learning the secrets of life, you can mix blood and organic matter to create animals. These infusion recipes create animals such as cows, rabbits, or horses.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.carnage.title: Carnage
item.um.demonomicon.entry.carnage.more_i: With Efficiency V, the tier II version can instantly mine stone.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.carnage.histor:
%8$s: Added.
%34$s: Retextured.
%39$s: Added tier IV version.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.carnage.recipe:
Blood Cost: 50
Booster Tier: I



쀳





Blood Cost: 150
Booster Tier: II



쀴





Blood Cost: 500
Booster Tier: III



쀵




Blood Cost: 1000
Booster Tier: IV



성
item.um.demonomicon.entry.carnage.descri: This hammer, made from %s, comes in four tiers. It is not only an effective mining tool but also a slow and powerful melee weapon.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.bloodstained_a:
The armor cannot recharge in the presence of bosses.
If your armor's blood count drops to 10 or lower, you will
be starved and rapidly take damage.
The armor holds a maximum of 200 blood.

Blood Cost: 250
Booster Tier: III
Any piece of chain armor works.
The whole set is made in one go.




쀶






The chestplate can be upgraded with the Bloodstained Heart:

Blood Cost: 250
Booster Tier: IV




쀷
This armor, reinforced with %s absorbs blood from a nearby Chalice when the set is worn. When you take damage, it then uses that blood to heal you for about 2 hearts.
The Amalgam itself is invulnerable. You must kill its minions to damage it.
Stay away when it cries out to avoid
its devastating blood shotgun.

Throw the Sanguine Eye into a Blood Chalice to fight the boss.
The Eye is made as such:

Blood Cost: 500
Booster Tier: III





쀸
A powerful amalgam of flesh and blood, the Blood Amalgam is a boss that can be summoned with a large sacrifice of blood and precious items.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.radiant_monoli: Beacons used to be used in place of this item.
Radiant Monoliths are the %s for the %s made using %s
item.um.demonomicon.entry.blood_monolith: The Tier IV Blood Altar was added after the other tiers.
Blood Monoliths are the %s for the %s made using Crystallized Blood Essence dropped from the %s
All Self-Infusions require Tier IV Boosters.

Self-Infusion involves imbuing your very lifeblood with magic. Self-Infusions apply permanent buffs to the nearest player to the Altar when crafted. They require the Crystallized Blood Essence obtained from the %s
item.um.demonomicon.entry.self_infusion_: All Self-Infusions require Tier IV Boosters.
Each Self-Infusion costs a certain amount of Tolerance. Your Tolerance cap starts at 5. If you overflow your cap, you will die instantly, losing all infusions in the process.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.ele_limbs.more: This infusion formerly granted several potion effects.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.ele_limbs.reci:
Tolerance Cost: 3
Blood Cost: 100
Booster Tier: IV





쁁
item.um.demonomicon.entry.ele_limbs.desc: Your most basic %s is an obvious start. By infusing your limbs with elemental materials, you can gain slightly increased strength and speed.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.iron_skin.more: This infusion formerly granted Resistance II.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.iron_skin.reci:
Tolerance Cost: 2
Blood Cost: 150
Booster Tier: IV





쁂
item.um.demonomicon.entry.iron_skin.desc: By infusing iron into your skin, you can become highly resistant to damage. Iron Skin grants additional armor points and toughness; combine it with upgraded Bloodstained armor and you can obtain full armor points.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.flame_body.mor: Very useful against the Pit Lord.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.flame_body.rec:
Tolerance Cost: 4
Blood Cost: 200
Booster Tier: IV





쁃
item.um.demonomicon.entry.flame_body.des: You have figured out how to become resistant to the dangers of the Nether. By infusing your body with various hot materials, you can become immune to natural fire, as well as gain 25% fire damage reduction.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.tolerance.more: This infusion is not lost if you die by overload.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.tolerance.reci:
Tolerance Cost: 0
Blood Cost: 300
Booster Tier: IV





쁄
item.um.demonomicon.entry.tolerance.desc: By embedding Nether Shards within your body and infusing your bones with gold, you can become able to tolerate much greater levels of magical enhancement. The Tolerant infusion adds +5 to your tolerance cap.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.enderlord.more: There used to be a charm with an identical effect to this infusion.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.enderlord.reci:
Tolerance Cost: 6
Blood Cost: 400
Booster Tier: IV





쁅
item.um.demonomicon.entry.enderlord.desc: While you have this infusion, sneak-jump to warp forward. Due to the limitations of your teleportation organs, this only works if nothing, not even tall grass, is at your destination.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.shadow_rifts.m:
One can become immune to the damage by holding
the Bone of Wither.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.shadow_rifts.d: In places, the veil between the Nether and the Shadow Realm thins. These rifts damage living matter around them and corrupt Iron and Gold into shadowy variants, Shadow Base and Tenebrous Base.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.shadebeasts.mo: Shadebeasts used to have an associated miniboss.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.shadebeasts.de: Mutated beasts born of darkness, Shadebeasts are monsters birthed of Shadow Rifts. Their attacks blind players, and they drop dark metal bases and ender pearls.
The bases can also be obtained from Shadebeasts.
%s can respectively be made into Shadow Steel and Tenebrous Metal, two useful crafting materials.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.shadow_plate.m:
I have gone insane due to people in my Discord server
not knowing what the word "mundane" means.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.shadow_plate.d: %s can be made into plates, along with mundane gold. These strong plates can be used in powerful gear.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.ebonquartz.mor: Ebonquartz is formed when raw quartz is exposed to entropy.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.ebonquartz.des: Mining quartz ore sometimes will yield Ebonquartz, a useful material imbued with minor shadow magic.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.shadecloth.mor: Shadecloth is cheaper than Shadow Plates, making it better for cheap gear.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.shadecloth.des: A dark fabric made by weaving dark alloys into it, Shadecloth is made from string, shadow steel, and tenebrous metal.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.shadow_armor.m: This armor does not have any effects beyond additional toughness.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.shadow_armor.d: %s can be used to make a suit of armor with toughness surpassing netherite.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.shade_armor.mo: This armor used to make you lose stealth after attacking with melee.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.shade_armor.de: %s can be used to make a dark suit of armor with minimal protection but grants invulnerability against one hit every few seconds.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.phantasmal_dag: Using this item with fully stealthed Shade Walker armor allows it to deal critical stealth strikes.
You can make a dagger which can clone itself and shoot forth at your enemies. It can also be used as a workable melee weapon.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.charms.title: Charms
item.um.demonomicon.entry.charms.more_in:
Combo - Melee attacking grants small stacking boosts to damage and attack speed
Sprint - Sprinting increases your speed over time
Mana Regen - Increases mana regen
Supercharge - Every few seconds a fully charged arrow gains bonus damage
Cure - Removes negative effects every few seconds
Panic - Taking damage grants speed

Frenzy - Being at low health boosts stats
Immunity - Increases invincibility after taking damage
Ghost Step - Allows sprinting through walls
Mana Conduit - Taking damage restores mana
Spectre Sight - Glows nearby entities
Cowardice - Increases melee damage at full health

Last Stand - Grants significant regen at cost of max HP when at low HP
Kinetic Field - Sometimes absorbs projectiles
Swirling - Sometimes launches foes hit by melee attacks
Blaze - Burns away at nearby entities
Counter Dash - Sneak jump to do a dash that can block an attack
Critical Hit - Melee hits have a chance to do double damage
item.um.demonomicon.entry.charms.recipe:
To use the Charm Table, place an armor piece in the upper-middle slot and a charm to its left.
For armors that accept two charms, place another charm to the right of the armor.





쁙
item.um.demonomicon.entry.charms.descrip: Charms are bits of runic text that can be found in loot and obtained by slaying bosses. Apply them to armor in the Charm Table (recipe shown in the Recipe section) to gain certain buffs (listed in the More Info section).
item.um.demonomicon.entry.shadow_guardia: This item cannot attack players who also wield it.
You have embedded a construct which binds a spirit from the Shadow Realm to a shield, forming an armament which summons an attack-countering shadow guardian.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.shadow_longswo:
This longsword cannot be enchanted, but has higher attack power than 
an unenchanted netherite sword or Bloody Edge.
Shadow Plates can be used to make a special sword. This sword cannot sweep and is slower, but can be sheathed and wielded to perform a Quick Draw attack.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.elder.title: The Elder
item.um.demonomicon.entry.elder.more_inf:
Listen for the loud echoing sound. Soon after, the boss will fire an extremely damaging deathray.
Get as close as possible and circle under him to dodge it.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.elder.recipe:
Summon by tossing the Relic of Ruin on the ground, made as such:





쁢
item.um.demonomicon.entry.elder.descript: A great eldritch god, The Elder keeps numerous magical devices such as Omega Runes. He may be summoned to this world and slain in a boss battle.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.omega_plate.mo: Omega Plates are not used in anything other than Omega armor.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.omega_plate.de: Using the Omega Runes looted from %s one can make magic-infused plates with unparalleled strength.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.omega_armor.mo: Omega armor is viable against the final boss.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.omega_armor.de: %s can be used in a suit of armor with extraordinary toughness. However, its true strength is in its ability to accept two charms at once.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.teleporters.mo: Teleporters only work if the target chunk is loaded. See Chunk Loaders.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.teleporters.de: Right click with a Locator Card near a teleporter to bind it to the teleporter. Then drop it on another teleporter to point the second to the first. Walk into a teleporter to go to its destination.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.recall_locator: This card only works if the target chunk is loaded. See Chunk Loaders.
Bound Locator Cards can be made into Recall Locator Cards. Right click with a Recall Locator Card to teleport to its target teleporter from anywhere.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.dragon_drops.m:
The Dragon's Wrath used to be the dragon's Lunatic drop,
and the Dragon Staff was formerly craftable.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.dragon_drops.h:
%12$s: Added Dragon's Wrath.
%22$s: Added Dragon Staff.
%34$s: Retextured.
%35$s: Added Dragon Lash and reworked the other two into drops.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.dragon_drops.d: The Ender Dragon gains additional drops. It will drop one of three weapons (one for each class) as well as a handful of Dragon Scales.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.dragon_scale_a:
With the wings, look up to go up, look down to go down, sneak to stay at the same height,
and sprint to fly in the direction you look quickly.
From Dragon Scales, an armor set can be crafted that grants functioning dragon wings with the full set.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.holy_alloy_pla: This item is used in an armor set and a weapon.
Blessed Fragments found in village and ruined portal chests can be used in Holy Alloy Plates, which are useful in melee gear.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.paladin_hammer: Every 5th strike with this weapon deals double damage and heals you.
Holy Alloy Plates can be used in a powerful melee weapon. It also acts as an axe.
Each helm grants a different potion effect to nearby players upon hitting with melee attacks.

The helms are in order: Avenger, Protector, Crusader.





쁶






쁷






쁸






쁹






삀






삁

Holy Alloy Plates can be used in a melee-focused armor set. The protection of this armor set is similar to iron, but it has three helm options: Avenger, Protector, and Crusader, respectively buffing melee damage, defense, and speed.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.fallen_paladin:
Unlike its predecessor, every Fallen Paladin helm grants a damage boost
(though the Avenger helm grants a much higher one).

This recipe applies to all pieces.





삂
Enhancing your Paladin Armor with netherite and nether shards infuses it with evil power, granting it much higher defenses and much stronger buffs.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.primal_armor.m:
The leaves used in this armor's recipe are jungle leaves.
This armor also grants a small boost to arrow velocity at all times.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.primal_armor.d: Using Hearts of the Wild found in jungle temples, an armor set can be made that infuses you with primal instinct. By avoiding damage, you can gain up to 3 charges which are used to reduce incoming hits or empower bow shots.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.shortbows.more: Both Shortbows also inflict Slowness and a DoT effect (Poison or Wither).
item.um.demonomicon.entry.shortbows.desc: Hearts of the Wild found in jungle temples can be used in the Shortbow of the Wild, which shoots with shorter range but higher power than a bow. This can then be upgraded to the Shortbow of Decay, which is more powerful.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.quivers.title: Quivers
item.um.demonomicon.entry.quivers.more_i:
The Venom Quiver inflicts Poison, while the Acid Quiver gives arrows the Dragon's Wrath effect
and the Shadow Quiver inflicts blindness and other weakening effects.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.quivers.descri: Quivers are offhand items for rangers that will enhance a fired arrow every 4 seconds with improved damage and other bonuses. The Venom Quiver can be made from Hearts of the Wild and upgraded twice with later materials.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.staff_of_the_m: The Lucid Staff, after 15 star hits, causes a large burst which deals massive damage.
The Staff of the Magi, made from Mysterious Crystals found in various loot, fires homing magic missiles. It can later be upgraded to the Lucid Staff which instead fires homing stars.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.magi_armor.mor: The ward regenerates 30 seconds after it is first damaged.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.magi_armor.des: This armor, made from Mysterious Crystals, has low defense but generates an absorption ward. If the ward is taken down, your mana regeneration is doubled until the ward is regenerated.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.astral_armor.m: The stars return if none have been lost in 3 minutes.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.astral_armor.r:
The recipe works for any piece.





삙
item.um.demonomicon.entry.astral_armor.d: Magi armor can be upgraded using Nether Shards to the Armor of the Astral, which in place of a ward generates four protective stars, each blocking one hit and restoring all your mana in the process.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.orbs.title: Orbs
item.um.demonomicon.entry.orbs.more_info:
The Mysterious Orb increases mana regen by 10 per second, the Astral Orb by 15,
and the Eldritch Orb by 20.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.orbs.descripti: Orbs are offhand items for mages that increase mana regeneration. The Mysterious Orb can be made with Mysterious Crystals and upgraded twice with later materials.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.early_magic_we: The Prismatic Scepter used to use an entire nether star in its recipe. Yeesh.

%22$s: Added.
%34$s: Retextured and scepter recipe changed.
The Iron Rod, Diamond Piercer, and Prismatic Scepter are magic weapons obtainable in the earlygame. They are respectively made from iron, diamond, and a Nether Shard.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.iron_whip.more:
Right click to extend the whip head. Hold it down to keep extending. If the head hits an enemy,
it deals significant damage and retracts. The chain can also damage enemies.
Sneak click to retract the whip.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.iron_whip.desc: The Iron Whip is a melee weapon forged from simple iron. Being the first available whip-class melee weapon, its functionality is unique; see "More Info" for usage details.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.abyssal_mirror: The mirror can also be crafted so long as you have received it normally.

Obtain for free when you have slain the first five bosses,
or craft as such after said time:





섇
Slaying the five great evils has broken the seal on a dark realm known as the Abyss. This mirror you hold grants access to it when used within the Nether.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.abyss.title: The Abyss
item.um.demonomicon.entry.abyss.more_inf: The Abyss generates spikes, which can sometimes be made of bone.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.abyss.descript: The Abyss is a dark realm reigned over by a mighty shade. Voidlings swarm within, and Abyssal Spires spawn, holding loot such as Charms and netherite items. One can leave it by using the Mirror again.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.voidling.title: Voidlings
item.um.demonomicon.entry.voidling.descr: Voidlings swarm within the Abyss, chasing down players. They drop Abyss Shards, powerful crafting materials.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.abyssal_longsw: The dark orb deals the same damage as the main attack without any buffs.
%s can be used to make a special sword. This sword cannot sweep and is slower, but can be sheathed and wielded to perform a Quick Draw attack which fires a dark orb.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.entropic_great: The shots from this bow split in 5 after some time.
%s can be used to make a powerful bow. It shoots with lower velocity than the likes of the Demonic Reinforced Bow but has very high damage and piercing.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.oblivion_staff: This weapon is affected by the Oblivion Matrix.
%s can be used to make a powerful staff. Right click an enemy to summon a dark charge, which a second later will explode into a void pillar, dealing heavy damage.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.abyss_knight_a:
This armor set used to not have a set bonus.
Thus, it worked quite well with the Pit Lord's Chestplate.

%s can be used to make a suit of armor honing your melee skills. The armor, in addition to being the most protective in the game, grants flat buffs to melee damage and attack speed and doubles your damage every few seconds for one hit.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.abyss_ranger_a: This armor also grants a small speed bonus.
%s can be used to make a suit of armor honing your bow skills. The armor boosts arrow velocity and allows you to sneak to build stealth, which is converted into bonus bow damage.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.abyss_warlock_: This armor summons cosmetic hands, which used to shoot orbs.
%s can be used to make a suit of armor honing your magic capability. The armor doubles mana regeneration when the set is worn.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.dungeon.title: The Dungeon
item.um.demonomicon.entry.dungeon.more_i:
The Dungeon has numerous rooms, including two challenging parkours.
It also contains eight unique loot items:
three chest loot weapons, three chest loot offhand items,
and two weapons dropped from the Disciple minibosses.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.dungeon.recipe:
Can be entered using the Sigil of the Shade, which is found in Abyssal Spires
in the Abyss.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.dungeon.descri: Using a Sigil of the Shade looted from Abyssal Spires, one can enter the Dungeon, a sprawling crypt of darkness constructed and overseen by Shadesull. There, you will encounter the two Disciple minibosses, as well as the final boss of Undermagic.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.shadesull.more:
Being the final boss of Undermagic, Shadesull is extremely challenging,
beyond anything else in the pack.
Shadesull has several "bullet hell" phases, where she
turns invincible and rains extremely damaging bullets from above,
including one at the start of the fight.
Do not bother attacking her during this phase until she teleports to end the phase
unless there are hands active.
If there are hands active, Shadesull is invincible until
they are killed.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.shadesull.reci:
Can be encountered in the Dungeon's boss room, 
or summoned using the Crown of Ruin after being encountered there,
made as such:





섣
item.um.demonomicon.entry.shadesull.desc: In the Dungeon's boss room one can encounter Shadesull, Queen of the Abyss and the final boss of Undermagic. She is a challenging boss with many phases and punishing attacks. See "More Info" for fight details.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.ultimate_offha:
The ultimate offhand items inherit enhanced versions of
the effects from both component items.
By combining a Demon Army drop and a Dungeon drop with the Dark Crystal Heart looted from Shadesull, one can create one of three extremely powerful offhand items.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.chunk_loader.m: Placing more than one chunk loader in a chunk may cause problems.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.chunk_loader.d: By combining drops from both vanilla bosses with Crying Obsidian, you can make a block that loads the chunk it is placed in.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.puncture.title: Puncture
item.um.demonomicon.entry.puncture.more_: Use Quick Charge on this item for best results.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.puncture.recip:
Blood Cost: 10
Booster Tier: I



섲





Blood Cost: 50
Booster Tier: II



섳





Blood Cost: 250
Booster Tier: III



섴




Blood Cost: 500
Booster Tier: IV



섵
item.um.demonomicon.entry.puncture.descr: A blood-infused crossbow with four tiers, the Puncture has high piercing and can sometimes shoot for critical damage.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.dark_pulsar.mo:
This item pairs very well with the Power enchantment,
Supercharge charm, and quivers.
item.um.demonomicon.entry.dark_pulsar.de: The Dark Pulsar's arrows start very slow, but quickly speed up to very high speeds. They also ignore gravity.
item.um.abyss_knight_set.lore.0: Ancient knowledge of blades seems to seep into your soul
item.um.abyss_knight_set.lore.1: Buffs melee strikes and allows you to deal 2x damage sometimes
item.um.abyssal_longsword.lore.0: Use while sheathed to Quick Draw
item.um.abyssal_longsword.lore.2: Quick Draw fires an abyssal orb
item.um.abyss_ranger_set.lore.0: Light seems to bend around the fabric
item.um.abyss_ranger_set.lore.1: Grants stealth and empowers arrow-firing weapons
item.um.abyss_warlock_set.lore.0: A power from beyond tugs at this armor
item.um.abyss_warlock_set.lore.1: Boosts mana regen and summons eldritch hands to your side
item.um.abyssal_mirror.lore: Use in the Nether to go to the Abyss.
item.um.blood_rain_staff.lore.1.normal: Drips harmful blood and may be upgraded via Blood Infusion
item.um.bloodstained_set.lore: Drains blood from Chalices for healing
item.um.bloody_edge.lore.1.normal: May be upgraded via Blood Infusion
item.um.bone_of_wither.lore: Protects against wither and shoots skulls
item.um.carnage.lore.0.tier_2: Tier II - 500 Blood to next tier
itme.um.carnage.lore.1.normal: Mining tool that may be upgraded through Blood Infusion
item.um.carnage.lore.1.tier_3: Crushes stone and bone with equal ease
item.um.crown_of_ruin.lore.0: Call upon the overlord of the Abyss...
item.um.crown_of_ruin.lore.1: Must be used within the Abyss
item.um.demon_flame_scepter.lore: Launches demon fire that lights the ground aflame
item.um.demonic_steel_set.lore: Protects its wearer with dark energy
item.um.demonic_steel_ingot.lore: Strong metal forged from demon essence
item.um.demonic_steel_longsword.lore.0: Use while sheathed to Quick Draw
item.um.demonic_steel_plate.lore: Heavy plate of metal, used to make armor and weapons
item.um.diamond_piercer.lore: Fires a diamond beam that pierces everything
item.um.draconic_bulwark.lore.1: Block attacks to create draconic blasts
item.um.dragon_scale.lore: It seems to have fallen off the great wyrm...
item.um.dragon_staff.lore: Spews draconic acid at your foes
item.um.dragon_scale_set.lore.0: Tougher than diamonds, it channels draconic power
item.um.dragon_scale_set.lore.1: Grants dragon wings with the full set
item.um.elder_staff.lore.0: Rapidly fires dark orbs, similarly to Elder bolts
item.um.elder_staff.lore.1: Sneak-click to fire a giant death orb
item.um.infernal_summons.lore: Throw into a demonic portal to summon the greatest demon...
item.um.inferno_staff.lore.0: Right click to summon giant fireballs
item.um.inferno_staff.lore.2: Provides absorption on a melee attack
item.um.mythical_dragon_egg.lore: Summons a wyrmling familiar on right-click
item.um.mythical_dragon_egg.lore.unbound: Right-clicking binds this item to you and you alone
item.um.niflheim_bow.lore.0: Mystical bow that shoots icy bolts
item.um.niflheim_bow.lore.1: Bolts pierce blocks, except obsidian and bedrock
item.um.oblivion_staff.lore: Conjures void pillars to obliterate your foes
item.um.phantasmal_dagger.lore: Use to rapidly throw intangible daggers
item.um.relic_of_ruin.lore: Throw on the ground to call a great eldritch being
item.um.sanguine_eye.lore: Throw into a Blood Crucible to summon a great hunger...
item.um.sanguis_inspectorum.lore: Right click to probe a nearby Blood Chalice
item.um.shade_walker_set.lore: Protects you fully from damage every few seconds
item.um.shadecloth.lore: A fabric that radiates dark energy
item.um.shadow_base.lore.0: Used to create a greater metal
item.um.shadow_set.lore: A superior armor to most others in toughness
item.um.shadow_guardian_bulwark.lore.0: Summons a shadow guardian when held in the offhand
item.um.shadow_guardian_bulwark.lore.1: The shadow reduces damage and counters attacks
item.um.shadow_longsword.lore.0: Use while sheathed to Quick Draw
item.um.shadow_plate.lore: An invincible plate of several dark alloys trimmed with gold
item.um.tenebrous_base.lore.0: Used to create an extreme material
item.um.tenebrous_ingot.lore: A warped metallic substance that hides incredible power
block.um.blood_monolith.lore: Boosts a Blood Chalice to Tier IV
subtitles.um.music.shadesull_p1: In the Chamber of Madness plays
